Class GuiController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.GuiController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GuiController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class handles all the UI things for the Tetris game. Basically it updates the screen, listens for keyboard, shows next bricks, ghost piece, score, level everything lah. I only added features like: ghost preview next 3 bricks display level + speed system pause/resume instant drop (Enter/Space) Game exit

      public GuiController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Here I prepare the game panel, load the digital font,and set up all the keyboard controls. This is basically the startup for the GUI.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • initGameView

      public void initGameView(int[][] boardMatrix, ViewData brick)
      Set up the game board visuals and show the first brick.This one only runs once. Creates the board grid, creates the brick blocks,and starts the falling timer.

    • refreshBrick

      public void refreshBrick(ViewData brick)
      Update the brick position on the screen, also draws the ghost piece.

    • refreshGameBackground

      public void refreshGameBackground(int[][] board)
      Updates the background matrix on the board,showing bricks that have already landed.

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the gravity movement (Tick Tock).
      Parameters:
      event - The move event

    • setEventListener

      public void setEventListener(InputEventListener eventListener)
      Connects the Logic brain to this Body

    • bindScore

      public void bindScore(javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty scoreProperty)
      Connects the score property to the UI display so it updates automatically. Also sets up the Level and Lines Cleared labels.

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver(int score)
      Show the Game Over panel and stop the game and play the gama over sound

    • newGame

      public void newGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Reset everything and start a new game.

    • pauseGame

      public void pauseGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Toggles pause and resume of game and background music.

    • updateNextBricks

      public void updateNextBricks(List<int[][]> nextBricks)
      Updates the panel that shows the next 3 upcoming bricks.

    • down

      public void down(MoveEvent event)
      Hard drop function (ENTER or SPACE).Plays clear sound when lines are removed. Moves the brick all the way down instantly. Also plays the clear sound if lines are destroyed.
      Parameters:
      event - The input event.

    • onLinesCleared

      public void onLinesCleared(int removed)
      Updates line count, level, speed, and plays animations.

    • exitToMenu

      public void exitToMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Goes back to the main menu when the player press the Exit button. This reload the start menu screen and continue the music.
      Parameters:
      event - the button click action

    • isPause

      public javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty isPause()

    • isGameOver

      public javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty isGameOver()

    • getEventListener

      public InputEventListener getEventListener()
